name: Olixir Technologies
tag_list: external-drives, hard-drives, rugged, transportable, rugged-drives, military-hard-drives, transportable-data-storage
overview:
Olixir Technologies offers rugged, high-capacity transportable hard drives either as standalone or as part of a larger removable hard drive rack or tower solution. They also offer customized solutions for specific requirements.

Olixir Technologies burst into the portable hard drive marketplace in 2001, filling an industry void for high-capacity, compact, and highly ruggedized hard disk drive-based storage solutions.

Their products are designed and targeted to address the stringent storage requirements of commercial and government organizations, incorporating a revolutionary patent-pending hard drive shock protection technology that safeguards data from drops, knocks, and bumps.

Integrating an industry-leading level of shock protection into an ultra-compact casing, they deliver hard drives that surpass the durability of other external hard drive solutions.

Applications of their products include: Small and Medium-sized Enterprise Backup and Disaster Recovery Storage of digital content, including photos and videos Mobile Digital Video Surveillance Data Transport Media Consolidation Video Editing Military/intelligence safeguarding in a vault Medical data storage Digital content creation

Clients include: Air Force, Navy, Army, Coast Guard, Homeland Security Northrop Grumman Candian Defense BAE Systems Raytheon Library of Congress Hundreds of Corporations Worldwide (in a variety of industries)
